catmetadata.longdescription:
The cosmic-utils category contains community-developed applications, applets, and utilities for the COSMIC desktop environment. These packages are maintained by the cosmic-utils organization on GitHub and provide additional functionality beyond the core COSMIC desktop components.
This includes full-featured applications (calculators, text editors, task managers, weather apps), panel/dock applets (system monitors, quick actions), and command-line utilities for COSMIC integration.
